events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but my package still hasn't arrived and there is no updated tracking information.
The reported issue involves a delay in delivery and lack of tracking updates from the customer.
Assigning the case to the delivery support agent team for further handling.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m here to help resolve the issue with your delayed order.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking information you have received so far?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. The last tracking update was from a week ago and it said 'in transit'.
We have contacted the courier service to get an updated status and expect to have more details within 24 hours.
Thanks for the update. I appreciate you looking into this, and I’ll wait for the courier’s response.
The courier has confirmed your package will be delivered tomorrow. We apologize for the delay and appreciate your patience.
Hello again, just checking to confirm that you have received your order as promised. Please let us know if there are any further issues.
Yes, I received the package today. Everything is in good condition now, thank you for your help!
We are glad to hear that your package arrived safely. Closing the case now. Feel free to contact us anytime.
Please take a moment to fill out our satisfaction survey so we can improve our services.
